title: New Ontario restrictions: Stay-at-home order extended, police given extra powers to 'strongly enforce' rules
content:
1. New Ontario restrictions: Stay-at-home order extended, police given extra powers to 'strongly enforce' rules  Yahoo News
  2. Dr. Isaac Bogoch breaks down the COVID-19 situation in Ontario ahead of Premier Ford's announcement  CTV News
  3. Ontario Sets Up Checkpoints, Shuts Construction in Virus Battle  Bloomberg
  4. Ontario extends stay-at-home order, restricts interprovincial travel as province loses battle against COVID-19  CTV Toronto
  5. Randall Denley: Doug Ford gives Ontario police-state tactics instead of COVID measures that actually work  National Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オンタリオ州の新しい規制 自宅待機命令が延長され、警察がルールを「強く執行」する権限が追加されました。
安大略省的新限制。延长留守令，警方被赋予额外权力 "强力执行 "规则。
安大略省的新限制。延長留守令，警方被賦予額外權力 "強力執行 "規則。
